div.h4:
شرح كتاب الجغميني المسمى بالملخص في علم الهيئة
Šarḥ [kitāb] al-Ǧiġmīni al-musammā bil-Mulah̬h̬as͎ fī 'ilm al-hay'ah
div.p:
Beskrivelse
The text is a commentary to the astronomical compendium al-Mulah̬h̬as͎ fī 'ilm al-hay'ah written by Maḥmūd ibn Muḥammad ibn 'Umar al-Ǧiġmīni al-H̬wārizmī. Astronomy Ta'līq Headings in red and the commented text marked with a read line Described in detail in: Catalogue of Oriental Manuscripts in Danish Collections, vol. 5,3 [pp. 295-298]
